insert into fbr_bill_available_archive (f_agen_code, f_bill_code, f_bill_name, f_number, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_operator_id, f_operator, f_version, f_logic_delete) values
(#{item.agenCode}, #{item.billCode}, #{item.billName}, #{item.number}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.operatorId}, #{item.operator}, #{item.version}, #{item.logicDelete})
mapper.select: SELECT A.f_agen_idcode as agenCode, A.f_type_code as billCode, W.f_bill_name as billName, W.f_number as number FROM fab_agen_bill A LEFT JOIN fbe_writeoff_billsummary W ON A.f_type_code = W.f_bill_code WHERE date_format(W.f_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(SYSDATE(), interval 1 day), '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.sql: f_id, f_agen_code, f_bill_code, f_bill_name, f_number, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_operator_id, f_operator, f_version, f_logic_delete
